summary:
$Feature$: EmbedChain class constructor arguments order has been changed for better consistency  
$Refactor$: SitemapLoader imports updated from urllib.parse to urlparse 
$Dependency Update$: bumped poetry version from 0.1.26 to 0.1.27

$Bug Fix$: Fixed the return type of ec chat.
$Documentation$: Bumped version to 0.1.28

$Feature$ Added 'citations' argument to EmbedChain class to retrieve citations from the database.
$Dependency Update$ Bumped version from 0.1.28 to 0.1.29.

$Feature$: Substack is added to the list of supported data sources.
$Refactor$: Improved handling of Substack data source by using the root URL and enhanced error handling.
$Dependency Update$: Updated version number from 0.1.29 to 0.1.30.
$Documentation$ Adds documentation about getting source along with the answer.
